lead_paragraph: When Yale’s Patrick Witt announced that he had withdrawn his Rhodes scholarship application, the Rhodes Trust had already learned that he had been accused of sexual assault.
snippet: When Yale’s Patrick Witt announced that he had withdrawn his Rhodes scholarship application, the Rhodes Trust had already learned that he had been accused of sexual assault.
